list.name: COMBO-SPINNER
list.description: Mortis spins his shovel dealing <!card.accessory.skill.damage.scaleToLevel> damage. Can also be aimed for a short-distance bat attack.
list.descriptionHtml: Mortis spins his shovel dealing damage. Can also be aimed for a short-distance bat attack.

list.name: CREATURE-OF-THE-NIGHT
list.description: Mortis turns into a flock of bats and travels to a target location.
list.descriptionHtml: Mortis turns into a flock of bats and travels to a target location.
